W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_DIVA_GRAVE_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You weren't able to find your heart. All you can do is move on to your next destination.

W03_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_DIVA_RUIN_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You weren't able to find your heart. All you can do is move on to your next destination.

W03_EVAR_DIVA_WELL_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_DIVA_WELL_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You weren't able to find your heart. All you can do is move on to your next destination.

W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DET.speaker: UI
W03_EVAR_DIVA_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DET.text: Is there really no option but to fight Dolores, the Warden of Pride?

W03_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W03_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world shrouded in darkness on the other side of the door, as well as a woman named Dolores. Will she be able to guide you to your heart?
